name: Velvet Matte Lipstick
description: Highly pigmented matte lipstick with 12-hour wear, enriched with vitamin E for smooth application.

name: Crystal Shine Lip Gloss
description: Hydrating lip gloss with a glossy finish and subtle shimmer, perfect for daily wear.

name: Hydra Care Lip Balm
description: Moisturizing lip balm with SPF 15, nourishes and protects lips from dryness.

name: Flawless Liquid Foundation
description: Full coverage lightweight foundation with SPF 25, suitable for all skin types and provides a natural glow.

name: Silk Finish Compact Powder
description: Oil-control compact powder with a silky smooth texture, sets makeup and reduces shine.

name: Natural Glow Blush Stick
description: Creamy blush stick that blends seamlessly for a natural rosy glow.

name: Radiance Highlighter Palette
description: 3-in-1 highlighter palette for a radiant, glowing finish on cheeks and eyes.

name: Dramatic Volume Mascara
description: Waterproof mascara that adds dramatic volume and length without clumping.

name: Glam Eyeshadow Palette
description: 12 richly pigmented shades with matte & shimmer finishes for versatile looks.

name: Precision Eyeliner Pen
description: Long-lasting waterproof eyeliner pen with a fine tip for precise application.

name: Soothing Makeup Remover
description: Gentle, alcohol-free makeup remover that hydrates while cleansing.

name: Hydrating Face Primer
description: Silicone-free primer that blurs pores and hydrates skin for smooth makeup application.
